quotes.quote: Doing nothing feels like floating on warm water to me. Delightful, perfect.
We all have an edge. We all are floating our psyche on top with a great ocean underneath.
The floating vapour is just as true an illustration of the law of gravity as the falling avalanche.
She would be half a planet away, floating in a turquoise sea, dancing by moonlight to flamenco guitar.
I liked the idea of the words floating in space and the space behind it moving all the time, ever changing.
If a stick is floating down a river and gets stuck, it doesn't need years of therapy. It just needs a little nudge and then it will get back into the flow of the river.
In this life, your so-called ordinary life, you must be rooted; and in your inner space, in the spiritual life, you must be weightless and flying and flowing, floating.
The vast sky is not hindered by the floating clouds.
The floating world is the realm of the graphic designer.
Wind is a floating wave of air, whose undulation continually varies.
Puberty for a girl is like floating down a broadening river into an open sea.
Ignore your thoughts. As you focus more intensely, you may feel as if you are floating.
Floating in a lake, lying in a hammock, playing a bit of Scrabble...that's what I'm in need of.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
Love is floating somewhere in the beautiful horizon with an equal wave length with same frequency of intense feelings.
You may feel a sensation of floating. You may see colors, maybe no phenomena, it doesn't matter. You are absorbing power.
At night, when the sky is full of stars and the sea is still you get the wonderful sensation that you are floating in space.
The soul, light as a feather, fluid as water, innocent as a child, responds to every movement of grace like a floating balloon.
A person is made up of awarenesses. All the awarenesses that have ever been our will ever be exist like barges floating in the ocean.
